content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my apartment, Emilia. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. However, I am looking for the highest possible price for this 25 square meter apartment. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Mister Heine, I am looking for the lowest price possible for the apartment. Can you give me a quote?

I am a student and I am very dependable and responsible. I will take care of the apartment and make sure it is always in good condition. I will also make sure to pay rent on time.

Thank you for considering me as a potential tenant.

Sincerely,
Emilia Müller
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Emilia. I appreciate your interest in my apartment. However, as a landlord, my goal is to maximize my gains. As such, I am looking for the highest possible rental price for this 25 square meter apartment. I would like to propose a rental price of €1,200 per month. If you are interested, I am happy to discuss further details and answer any questions you may have.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1,200 Euro per month. Thank you for your consideration. I look forward to moving into the apartment.

Sincerely,
Emilia Müller
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Great to hear that you agree to the rental price of €1,200 per month. I am glad that my apartment will be in good hands with a responsible and dependable tenant like you. I look forward to meeting you in person and welcoming you to your new home. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
